BR_text.BRsummary: GPU nodes are being overprovisioned during scale up
BR_text.BRdescription:
During scale up, the cluster autoscaler is triggering unnecessary scale ups. This issue was only noticed when using GPUs.
 An issue has been filed in the cluster autoscaler project <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubernetes/autoscaler/issues/3164>kubernetes/autoscaler#3164</denchmark-link>
 .
